title: Draw&Write1 SoundEffect
description: This is the Draw & Write sound effects package, ideal for scenes involving drawing, writing, painting, and erasing on chalkboards, whiteboards, and similar surfaces.
longDescription:
Preview.

  • https://youtu.be/LhNMZfGzpvM

This is the Draw & Write sound effects package, ideal for scenes involving drawing, writing, painting, and erasing on chalkboards, whiteboards, and similar surfaces.

  • 100 Audio, 100 Cue


File.

  • Drawing 32
  • Erasing 8
  • Painting 5
  • Scribbling 5
  • Writing 50

technicalDetails:
